\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\& {X_\bullet} \&\& {A^\Lambda} \\
	{\,} \&\&\&\& {\,} \\
	\& {Y_\bullet} \&\& {B^\Lambda}
	\arrow["{m_\bullet}", from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{f_\bullet}"', from=1-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{g^\Lambda}", from=1-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{s_\bullet}"{description}, dashed, from=3-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{n_\bullet}"', from=3-2, to=3-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
